name: Last Tech Defense
description:
NOW FULL GAME FREE - Especially for our new crowdfunding campaign!

Earth has been dominated by artificial intelligence but do they really want to exterminate us? Protect your base containing last piece of powerful technology in your secluded mountain settlement. Use towers to build energy chains, collect ore, produce and command units, fight bosses and make it to the final endless wave to compete with other players on a leader board.

This is a twist on tower defense where you mainly command units and have only one kind of a tower but it is very useful. This game relies on Your feedback to become better or even completely different. Please, comment below.

Music:

Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
